projects.title: Project Manager
projects.description: A mobile app to quickly capture and organize project ideas, ensuring no great concept is forgotten.

projects.title: Thermal Expansion Simulator
projects.description: A physics-based simulation built with Godot that visually demonstrates thermal expansion. Designed as an educational tool, it showcases fundamental physics concepts interactive and accessible.

sample.title: TaskFlow
sample.description: A minimalist task management application built with React and Node.js. Features real-time collaboration and a clean, distraction-free interface.
